citation.case_name: Galveston, Harrisburg, & San Antonio Railway Company, Plffs. In Err. v. State of Texas

html:
177 U.S. 103

20 S.Ct. 559

44 L.Ed. 690

GALVESTON, HARRISBURG, & SAN ANTONIO RAILWAY COMPANY et al., Plffs. in Err.,
v.
STATE OF TEXAS.

No. 82.

Supreme Court of the United States

March 26, 1900

October Term, 1899.

1

Note. This involves precisely the same questions that have just been determined in the foregoing case, and the same judgment will therefore be entered.
